content: skill level intermediate / adventurous beginner - i wouldn t recommend this pattern for complete beginners since the increases and decreases can be a bit confusing materials -yarn - dk/sport weight 3 yarn i used brava sport but a similar yarn can be used -4 00mm hook -scissors -tapestry needle -measuring tape or gauge tool notes this pattern is worked from side to side in 2 body panels that are then seamed together ribbing is added once pieces are seamed this pattern is made to have 0-2 of positive ease important the beginning and end of each row determine the increases and decreases that shape the top so that it has a v-neck shape make sure to pay special attention to the beginning and end of each row to make sure you re working into the specified stitches/chains and skipping any specified stitches/chains
